title: LeBron’s injury causing tension, Kyrie apologizes and Kansas City needs to close games
itunes:title: LeBron’s injury causing tension, Kyrie apologizes and Kansas City needs to close games
description:
Colin discusses the friction between LeBron James' camp and the Los Angeles Lakers, the Kansas City Chiefs not being able to close out big games, Boston Celtics G Kyrie Irving calling LeBron James, and why the New England Patriots are not old. Guests include Plaxico Burress, Greg Cosell, Chris Broussard, and Greg Jennings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
